snippet.title: The top 7 acquisitions of all-time in social media, and why they matter
snippet.description: Social media acquisitions continue to top the charts in yearly M&A reports, and the Facebook-Whatsapp deal set the bar higher than ever. Here's a countdown of the most important so...

snippet.title: How Aaron Levie and his childhood friends built Box into a $2 billion business, without stabbing each other in the back
snippet.description: One of the most hotly-anticipated tech IPOs of 2014 is run by four childhood classmates who grew up and built a cloud computing juggernaut during their 20s.

snippet.title: The BlackBerry Z10 has the right price, but is it worth it?
snippet.description: Before you pay the reduced price for a BlackBerry Z10, make sure that you're aware of the downsides of this device.

snippet.title: iOS 7: Through the eyes of an app developer
snippet.description: Apple has introduced an exciting new SDK in iOS 7 to arm developers with the tools to support new features and capabilities.

snippet.title: WWDC 2013 hardware updates: Revisions bold or blah?
snippet.description: Erik Eckel offers his first impressions of the hardware updates announced by Apple and what aspects he thinks will be most relevant to business users.

snippet.title: Google Now: The future of big data and Android's game-changer
snippet.description: While Google Now raises plenty of privacy hackles, it's also a stunningly useful example of the power of big data and a major advantage for Android.

snippet.title: The 10 must-see geek movies of 2013
snippet.description: There are approximately 50 geek-centric movies set for major theatrical release in 2013, but these are the only 10 you need to care about.
